General.Name: Accel S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Accel, S.A.B. de C.V. provides manufacturing and logistics services in Mexico and the United States. The company's Manufacturing division manufactures and produces candies and nuts, as well as engages in the real estate activities. Its Logistics division offers solutions for handling, conservation, conditioning, and distribution of merchandise; collection, selection, and delivery of merchandise; inventory control; packaging and labeling; crossing platform; and other services. Accel, S.A.B. de C.V. was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Virginia Fábregas No. 80, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 06470
